name: 陳孝行
objective: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
schedule:
Week 1  Introduction　　
Week 2  Chemistry Kinetics
Week 3  Equilibrium-Thermodynamics　　
Week 4  Acid-base chemistry　　
Week 5  Acid-base chemistry: pC-pH diagram　　
Week 5  First midterm　　
Week 7  Acid-base chemistry-pC-pH diagram　　
Week 8  Buffer, Carbonate system　　
Week 9  Carbonate system　　
Week 10 EPA model: Mineql+　　
Week 11 Coordination chemistry 　　
Week 12 Second midterm　　
Week 13 Precipitation and dissolution　　
Week 14 Precipitation and dissolution　　
Week 15 Redox reaction pE-pC diagram　　
Week 16 Redox reaction- corrosion 　　
Week 17 Presentation　　
Week 18 Final examination
scorePolicy:
Mid term twice　　                  40 %
Preclass reading and Homework　　20 %
Report and presentation　　         15 %
Final examination (could be oral)　　25 %
